infos.value: There is a reason Leonis Castle is known the world over.
Your Majesty, is this really the time to praise brick and mortar...?
Our victory is all but assured should we infiltrate the castle...correct?
Yes.
It should prove easy enough for one squadron to remain unseen.
...Very well.
And we need only break through the gates?
Yes.
Then I shall reveal the last trick up my sleeve.
The last...trick?
That egg... Could it be an ancient relic?
Precisely.
It was not supposed to see light until the time came to lay siege on Rundall's castle...but I suppose now is as good as ever.
Arise, Golem!
Cover the advancing troops! Lilyth!
All right, leave it to me!
King Robb...!
Hahaha. I have not felt a thrill like this in quite some time.
W-wait, Mont. It's too soon.
You'll be under a barrage of fire if you rush in now!
It will work. I have Mach√©rie with me.
What do you mean by that?
Do you intend to use Ifrit to wipe out the Fennes soldiers!?
...No, that's not it.
Now, King Robb!
I see. You have thought this out well.
...He really pulled it off.
To think of using Ifrit's flames as a distraction...
Save your admiration for later.
Because now we're the ones in the enemy's sights!
Roger!
